page.title: 06Farming Rumbold's
page.content: {Rumbold's Farm & Hammond's {Farm,Hammond's Lane,Lt.Baddow,Essex. { {Vegetables For Freezing.}90 hectares of land on this arable farm are used for peas,french beans and cabbage.The peas and french beans are processed immediately for the frozen food market.Mr.Thorogood,the owner, showed us the cabbages being loaded for market.They were packed in crates to leave at 1 a.m. for Covent Garden Market, ready to be delivered to the shops for sale at 9 a.m.{ {Rotation.}Rotated crops are wheat(140 hectares) barley(95 hectares) potatoes (30 hectares) Cabbage,peas,french beans(90 hectares) {Farm Machinery.}Potato harvesting and sorting, grain harvesting, processing and storage are mechanised.
